name: Space Wars [Prototype]
description:
Link To Game :  https://spacewarsgame.static.app/

Details : Space Wars is a very simple, 1980's themed space-shooting game prototype with 2 versions of gameplay, Space Army Standoff and Sudden Invasion. Created with Construct3, Space Wars is designed only for desktops with a keyboard and cursor only. It's highly inspired by Space Invaders and Galactica!

Additional Notes : Submitted as part of a 6-day school assignment, this is my first ever game project...meaning it has LOTS of mistakes (sorry). Still, I thought I might share here too.
